description.value:
Trigger A living creature attempts to descend the stairwell at area A1 a into the islet's interior

Effect A ghostly version of Zutha's face appears above the island. Meanwhile, the rubble on the islet warps into smaller versions of Zutha's face. The faces howl in rage as one. All creatures on the islet must succeed at a @Check[will|dc:42] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Frightened]{Frightened 3} on a critical failure). The haunt then rolls initiative.

One of Zutha's rubble-masks vomits a swarm of maggots. (The masks appear everywhere on the islet, and destroyed masks reform moments later, making nowhere on the islet safe.) The maggots burrow into the flesh of a creature of the GM's choice. The creature takes @Damage[2d12[persistent,piercing]] damage (@Check[fortitude|dc:42|basic] save) and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for as long as they continue taking this damage. When the persistent damage ends, the maggots dissolve into foul-smelling oil.

One of Zutha's scythes swipes at a creature of the GM's choice. The creature must attempt a @Check[reflex|dc:42] save with the following results.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[(3d10+10)[void]] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[(6d10+10)[void]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1}.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[(12d10+10)[void]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 2}.

The ghostly image of Zutha's face belches a toxic cloud that reeks of decaying flesh. The cloud fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] centered anywhere on the island and lasts until the haunt's next turn. Any creature that enters the area or that starts its turn in the area must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:44] save with the following results.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes @Damage[5d8[poison]|options:area-damage] damage.

Failure The creature takes @Damage[10d8[poison]|options:area-damage] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[20d8[poison]|options:area-damage] damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} for as long as it remains sickened.

stealth.details: (expert) to sense Zutha's hungry spirit before it manifests

details.description: The scowling visage of Runelord Zutha appears above the altar. Meanwhile, mask-like versions of Zutha's face manifest on nearby rubble and vomit swarms of maggots. Once the masks are destroyed, the air fills with spectral duplicates of Zutha's life-draining bone scythe.
details.disable: @Check[occultism|dc:45] (legendary) or Religion (legendary) to exorcise Zutha's spirit, or @Check[intimidation|dc:48] (master) or @Check[performance|dc:48] (master) to recite the details of Zutha's defeat; six total successes are required to disable the haunt.

publication.title: Pathfinder Adventure Path #220: Crypt of Runes

details.reset: The haunt deactivates once no living creatures remain nearby. The haunt resets 1 hour later.
details.routine: (4 actions) The haunt uses Vomit Maggot three times, then Poisonous Belch once. For each success at Disabling the haunt, the haunt loses one Vomit Maggot action. Destroying a mask also removes one of the haunt's Vomit Maggot actions. Once the haunt can no longer use Vomit Maggot, it immediately regains three actions and replaces Vomit Maggot with Spectral Scythe. Destroying a scythe also removes one of the haunt's Spectral Scythe actions. Once the haunt loses all three of its Spectral Scythe actions, the haunt is destroyed.
